languages.text: "Почему Император еще не направил ткачей воздать мне за грехи? Видно, заслуживаю я смерти не от клинка, а от гнили моровой ямы..."

traits.locale_text: "Почему Император еще не направил ткачей воздать мне за грехи? Видно, заслуживаю я смерти не от клинка, а от гнили моровой ямы..."

languages.text: "Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."
languages.original_text: "Почему Император еще не направил ткачей воздать мне за грехи? Видно, заслуживаю я смерти не от клинка, а от гнили моровой ямы..."

traits.locale_text: "Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."
"Why isn't the Undying One sending His shepherds to grant me liberation?"
"Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."
"Why doesn't the Undying One send His shepherds to grant me liberation?"
"Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."
"Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."
"Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."
"Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."

languages.text: «¿Por qué no envía el Emperador a Sus hilanderas para castigarme por mis actos? Supongo que no merezco que acabe conmigo una hoja, sino la podredumbre del pozo de la pestilencia...».
languages.original_text: "Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no envía el Emperador a Sus hilanderas para castigarme por mis actos? Supongo que no merezco que acabe conmigo una hoja, sino la podredumbre del pozo de la pestilencia...».

languages.text: 「なぜ皇帝は、私の過ちを罰するために織り手を遣わさないのか？私は刃物で死ぬ資格はなく、疫病の穴の腐敗で死ぬしかないのでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ皇帝は、私の過ちを罰するために織り手を遣わさないのか？私は刃物で死ぬ資格はなく、疫病の穴の腐敗で死ぬしかないのでしょう…」

languages.text: “帝皇为什么不派祂的织网者来惩罚我的罪过？大概是因为我不配死在他们手上，只配慢慢地烂死在疫病坑里吧……”
languages.original_text: "Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇为什么不派祂的织网者来惩罚我的罪过？大概是因为我不配死在他们手上，只配慢慢地烂死在疫病坑里吧……”

languages.text: Warum schickt der Imperator nicht Seine Spinner, um mich für meine Fehler zu bestrafen? Ich verdiene es wohl nicht, durch eine Klinge zu sterben. Also lässt Er mich in der Pestgrube verrotten ...
languages.original_text: "Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."

traits.locale_text: Warum schickt der Imperator nicht Seine Spinner, um mich für meine Fehler zu bestrafen? Ich verdiene es wohl nicht, durch eine Klinge zu sterben. Also lässt Er mich in der Pestgrube verrotten ...

languages.text: « Pourquoi l'Empereur n'envoie-t-Il pas Ses tisseurs me punir pour mes fautes ? Il faut croire que je ne mérite pas de mourir au fil de l'épée, je vais pourrir sur pied dans la fosse aux pestilences... »
languages.original_text: "Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi l'Empereur n'envoie-t-Il pas Ses tisseurs me punir pour mes fautes ? Il faut croire que je ne mérite pas de mourir au fil de l'épée, je vais pourrir sur pied dans la fosse aux pestilences... »

languages.text: "İmparator, hatalarımın bedelini ödetmek için neden dokurlarını göndermedi? Herhâlde kılıçla ölmeyi hak etmiyorum. Bana veba çukurunun çürümüşlüğü layık..."
languages.original_text: "Why doesn't the Emperor send His spinners to punish me for my faults? I guess I don't deserve to die by a blade, only by the rot of the pestilence pit..."
